prompts: Create a mystical steel-type Pokemon with an ancient design and a serene expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of tranquility and balance, with a metallic sheen.
Show me a unique dual-type Pokemon that features a blend of ancient architecture and nature.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a bell, with intricate patterns and a calming aura.
Generate a Pokemon that protects sacred places, featuring a robust body and a wise demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing a harmonious blend of steel and nature.
I want a Pokemon that has an aura of protection, with a strong but peaceful presence.
